resources.string:
Terms and Conditions 

1. Introduction 

		Welcome to our service. By using our services, you agree to the following Terms and Conditions. Please read carefully before continuing to use the service. 

2. Information Collection 

		To provide our services, we collect and record the following information: Name Telephone Email Saved images 

3. Use of Information 

		The information collected will be used exclusively to: Ensure the proper functioning of the service. Contact users as needed. 

4. Data Protection 

		We are committed to protecting your personal data. The information collected will not be used to: Artificial intelligence (AI) processing. Marketing or selling to other companies or third parties. 

5. Information Sharing 

		We do not share your personal information with third parties except as required by law or with your express consent. 

6. User Rights 

		You have the right to access, correct or delete your personal information stored in our system. To exercise these rights, please contact us through our customer service channel. 

7. Changes to Terms and Conditions 

		We reserve the right to update these Terms and Conditions periodically. We will notify our users of any significant changes via our website or by email. 

8. Contact 

		If you have any questions or concerns about our Terms and Conditions, please contact us via email at felipeb2silva@gmail.com.
